section.title: Setting up 3PAR
section.p: The following section outlines the steps you need to follow in order to configure a Virtual File Server and a share for use by the Kubernetes NFS provisioner.

ol.li:
In the General section, as shown in , specify a name, in this instance gab_vfs3par
Create Virtual File Server - General

In the Storage Allocation Settings section, as shown in , set the Provisioning to Thin Provisioned, select an appropriate CPG, in this instance FC_r1, and set the size, for example, 1 terabyte.
Create Virtual File Server - Storage Allocation Settings

Add a virtual IP address as shown in .
Create Virtual File Server - Add Virtual IP Address

section.p: Following these steps will result in a Virtual File Server as shown in .

ol.li:
In the General section, as shown in , specify a name, in this instance gab_vfs3par, and select the Virtual File Server that you just created.
Create File Store - General

Use the default Security settings, as shown in .
Create File Store - Security

section.p: Following these steps will result in the File Store shown in .

ol.li:
In the General section of the Create File Share dialog as shown , set the share type to NFS Share and set a share name, for example, gab_fileshare3par
Create File Share - General

In the Share Path section, select the virtual file server and file store that you created earlier, as shown in
Create File Share - Share Path
